name: Potion
description: Heals the HP of your Linemon by 20 points.

name: Super Potion
description: Heals the HP of your Linemon by 50 points.

name: Hyper Potion
description: Heals the HP of your Linemon by 100 points.

name: Fire Stone
description: A stone capable of evolving fire-types.

name: Water Stone
description: A stone capable of evolving water-types.

name: Grass Stone
description: A stone capable of evolving grass-type Linemons.

name: Electric Stone
description: A stone capable of evolving electric-type Linemons.

name: Ground Stone
description: A stone capable of evolving ground-type Linemons.

name: Wind Stone
description: A stone capable of evolving wind-type Linemons.

name: Silver Floppy Disk
description: A little bit better at catching Linemons than the normal Floppy Disk.

name: Golden Floppy Disk
description: A little bit better at catching Linemons than the Silver Floppy Disk.

name: Red Floppy Disk
description: A Floppy Disk for catching fire-types.

name: Blue Floppy Disk
description: A Floppy Disk for catching water-types.

name: Green Floppy Disk
description: A Floppy Disk for catching grass-types.

name: Yellow Floppy Disk
description: A Floppy Disk for catching electric-types.

name: Brown Floppy Disk
description: A Floppy Disk for catching ground-types.

name: Gray Floppy Disk
description: A Floppy Disk for catching wind-types.
